title: The Nicosystem's™ Beginner Terran Builds:
description: Hello everyone! This is a collection of builds I recommend newcomer and veteran Terran players alike to start learning in order to succeed in tournament series and on ladder.

title: Sc2 Tools for Improvement #2: Big Brain Game
description: Learn how to play the 'Big Brain Game' - thinking multiple steps ahead and making strategic decisions in StarCraft 2.

title: Starcraft 2 Tips and Tricks #72: When to A-move vs When to Right click
description: This video goes over the differential of when to a-move vs when to right click and specific situations for each.

title: Simple Early Game Zerg Setup vs Protoss
description: This video goes over how you want to position your queens and when to get your spores / how to scout.

description: We have all been on the backfoot time and time again, but there is no victory sweeter than the victory one makes from being behind.

description: This tip video shows you how to set a rally to speed mine on worker creation

title: Starcraft 2 Tips and Tricks: How and When to Tech Switch
description: In this video we discuss the importance of being able to switch tech paths very quickly and how to do so effectively

title: Alternative TvT opener: Marauder Reaper into Mech
description: This is a game where I showcase an alternative eco cheese opening in tvt that lets you skip the raven bs phase entirely if you are lucky and will outright win the game sometimes.

description: Did you know scvs can repair while they are flying? this video goes over how to execute it and situations where it is useful.

title: TVP basics - Constant Aggression
description:
Looking at TVP from a perspective of constant aggression in the first stage of the game. 

This is a really good opener to ultimately keep protoss on their toes!

title: TVZ Basics - GamerRichy
description:
Hi all, 

Whether you are Bronze to Masters and your looking to identify standard build orders or looking for something specific in terms of a scouting timing, please see the first 5 mins of a game of TVZ playing safe and ultimately easy damage!

title: TVT basics - Snowball to victory
description: Basic concepts in TVT to be safe while opening double gas and making the right decision for the final fight!

title: Scouting Zerg with 3cc Hellion Banshee
description: Hello everyone! In this video I show you guys the current golden standard build of TvZ alongside how to effectively scout your opponent with key timings at a high level.

title: The Nicosystem™ 5-1-1 Tank Push vs Toss
description: Hello everyone! This is the 5-1-1 Tank push vs toss using double gas, the most standard and effective TvP build currently available to use on ladder. Focused on exploited tosses' weakest defence aside from ultra-late game which is the 3rd timing, this build gears on shutting down the protoss before they can scale uncontrollably.

title: The Nicosystem™ 2-1-1 Stimbat Guide
description: Hello everyone! This is the legendary GamerRichy's stimbat build that he has passed along to me to share with you guys. A modified version of 2-1-1 this build catches many Zergs offguard and has led to many successful ladder wins. One of my favourite builds, it is also one I recommend most Terrans to learn as it teaches a different style of the game to the standard 3cc builds.

title: Krystianer Masterclass: New Patch (PvZ & PvP & PvT) + Live Games
The Nicosystem™ Beginner Terran Builds: TvT Defensive Gas First
description: Hello everyone, this build is designed for defensive oriented players that like having an economical advantage. You can be on level playing field vs double gas openers but with additional income as long as you play defensively. This catapults you ahead in the mid-lategame where you can snowball this economic lead.
